New Records: Nicholas Pooran overtakes Chris Gayle to score the highest individual score in a T20 World Cup match for West Indies
Omarzai bowled the joint most expensive over in T20Is
Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran's explosive innings of 98 helped West Indies score their highest total in a men's T20 World Cup match
Rashid Khan's dismissal marked the end of Afghanistan's innings
Pre-Game Insights: The pitch in St Lucia has been friendly to batters, with three totals of 180 or more in four innings so far
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: Johnson Charles may become the most decorated man in T20 World Cup history in a few weeks' time
Others: Hazratullah Zazai replaced the injured Mujeeb Ur Rahman in Afghanistan's squad
